title: Nilave Vaa Lyrics Mouna Ragam
stanzas:
Kaaveriyaa kaanal neeraa
Penne enna unmai.
Mulveliya mullai poovaa
Sollu konjam nillu

Ammaadiyo neethaan
Innum siru pillai
Thaangaathamma nenjam
Neeyum sonna sollai

Poonjolaiyil vaadai kaattrum
Vaada sandham paada
Koodaadhendru Â koorai
Poovum eevum mannil meedhu

Orey oru paarvai
Thandhaalenna thene
Ore oru vaarthai sonnaalenna
Maane .
